verses.text: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:

crossRefs.note: Another Comforter (advocate)
He ever liveth to make intercession

verses.text: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.

crossRefs.note: Propitiation through faith in his blood
Sent his Son to be the propitiation

verses.text: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.

crossRefs.note: If ye love me, keep my commandments

verses.text: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.

crossRefs.note: Profess they know God; in works deny him

verses.text: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.

crossRefs.note: If a man love me, he will keep my words

verses.text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.

crossRefs.note: Christ left us an example

verses.text: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.

crossRefs.note: Love thy neighbour as thyself

verses.text: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.

crossRefs.note: A new commandment… love one another

verses.text: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.

crossRefs.note: Walk while ye have the light

verses.text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.

crossRefs.note: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour

verses.text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.

crossRefs.note: Way of the wicked is as darkness

verses.text: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.

crossRefs.note: Remission of sins through his name

verses.text: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.

crossRefs.note: Stand against the wiles of the devil

verses.text: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.

crossRefs.note: Thy word have I hid in mine heart

verses.text: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.

crossRefs.note: Friendship of the world is enmity with God

verses.text: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.

crossRefs.note: Saw that the tree was good… pleasant to the eyes

verses.text: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.

crossRefs.note: Fashion of this world passeth away

verses.text: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.

crossRefs.note: Man of sin revealed
False Christs and false prophets

verses.text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.

crossRefs.note: Many of his disciples went back
There must be heresies… that they which are approved may be made manifest

verses.text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.

crossRefs.note: Spirit will guide you into all truth

verses.text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.

crossRefs.note: If ye believe not that I am he

verses.text: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: (but) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.

crossRefs.note: He that honoureth not the Son

verses.text: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.

crossRefs.note: If my words abide in you

verses.text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.

crossRefs.note: In hope of eternal life, which God promised

verses.text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.

crossRefs.note: Many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many

verses.text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.

crossRefs.note: They shall teach no more every man his neighbour
The Comforter shall teach you all things

verses.text: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

crossRefs.note: When he shall appear, we shall be like him
Blameless in the day of our Lord

verses.text: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.

crossRefs.note: Born again… of God
Whosoever believeth… is born of God
